SummaryEnglish: The story is set in a certain country in Most City, where the handsome editor-in-chief Tarō, 10-year-old assistant Jirō, and the dog Saburō run a small publishing company. The company publishes the Monthly Mōsō (Delusion) Science magazine with articles about bizarre paranormal phenomena. A scientist named Gorō visits the editorial department one day, and they all get involved in an incident that even science cannot explain.

1.TitleEnglish: Issue 1: More Than Shocking! Taro's Transformation!
1.SummaryEnglish: The lackadaisical staff of the unusual Monthly Moso Science magazine have their routine shaken up when an unlucky research scientist shows up out of the blue asking for their assistance in uncovering the truth about a mysterious lost continent.

2.TitleEnglish: Issue 2: Hold on a Moment, Why Are You Working Here?!
2.SummaryEnglish: Continuing his search for information on the mysterious Mo Continent, Goro Sato joins the staff at Monthly Moso Science to investigate strange rumors of an unusual glowing well.

3.TitleEnglish: Issue 3: More Than Just Singing?! Musical Speak?!
3.SummaryEnglish: At last, Moment Marriage discovers a possible match for Taro. Unfortunately, his date plans are interrupted by an actor who can't stop singing.

4.TitleEnglish: Issue 4: Monstrous?! The Secret of Loch Nuss
4.SummaryEnglish: Monthly Moso Science needs a big scoop to satisfy its new advertisers, and the secret may be lurking in the waters of the picturesque Loch Nuss.

5.TitleEnglish: Issue 5: What're You Moping About?! The Ice Prince
5.SummaryEnglish: Goro is determined to investigate the legend of the Expressway Mask, a mysterious figure rumored to cause accidents. Meanwhile, a figure skating coach shows up at the café in search of information regarding an odd situation with one of his skaters.

6.TitleEnglish: Issue 6: There's Whole Mobs of Them?! This Is Where the Cats Gather!
6.SummaryEnglish: Frustrated by having his romantic encounters ruined by allergies, a model contacts Monthly Moso Science to investigate why hordes of cats congregate outside his apartment every night.

7.TitleEnglish: Issue 7: The Moment Is Here! A Matchmaking Party
7.SummaryEnglish: Taro's dream of becoming a homemaker seems closer than ever when he receives an invitation to an exclusive VIP-only matchmaking event. But there's a catch: he has to bring Goro. Meanwhile, White Pegasus makes a move to steal the remaining MOParts.

8.TitleEnglish: Issue 8: Body Moving! Walk One Dog and More Will Follow
8.SummaryEnglish: The White Pegasus Company is sponsoring Most City's first-ever dog show, and the staff of Monthly Moso Science have been personally invited. Saburo seems strangely eager to participate, but is there more to this competition than it seems?

9.TitleEnglish: Issue 9: Mystery Moments! The Young Genius' Past
9.SummaryEnglish: The secret origin of Edward Chi's fascination with the Mo Continent reveals a surprising connection...

10.TitleEnglish: Issue 10: Holy Moly! A Fight and a Continental Rising?!
10.SummaryEnglish: Catherine presents Goro with all six MOParts, leaving the decision to use them in the hands of Monthly Moso's staff. At last, the Mo Continent's true nature might come to light.

11.TitleEnglish: Issue 11: Move Out! Catherine, Why Didn't You Warn Us?!
11.SummaryEnglish: Everyone rushes to the newly raised Mo Continent, where they learn of an advanced weapon with the power to eradicate humanity.

12.TitleEnglish: Issue 12: The Unbelievable World, In Motion!
12.SummaryEnglish: The staff of Monthly Moso Science has just minutes to unravel an ancient code and stop the advanced weapon Ra Mo before it wipes out humanity.
